text: Quite a nice Chinese restaurant. The variety might not be extensive but the food is quite nice. Highlights were the garoupa fish, clay pot chicken,friend prawn and the vegetables. It's in an interesting office building but the deco seems very simple

Had family dinner and celebrated my sister's birthday together at this wonderful restaurant. We ordered the set, the portion for each pax just nice. Dishes are up to our expectation. Price slight on the high side but worth to try. Will be back for others dishes.

Surprise find. Hidden in the top floors of the building. Serves an assortment of dim sum, the beef roll was good and unique. Must order the cabbage chicken pot and The peach gum desert.  Both were tasty. Can skip the pork ribs though. However it felt a bit rushed through as staffs were trying to call it a day.

Second visit since CNY2025. Consistent and good quality food despite an obviously packed restaurant, which is impressive. Service is top notch, everyone was helpful, attentive and smiling! Such a happy dining experience. Menu prices are very reasonable as well.

Must tries: crispy yam bags with scallops, garoupa fillet claypot with ginger and garlic, guifei beancurd and of course the coconut with peach gum! dim sum are all very good too!

food was amazing, especially the claypot spring chicken and the young coconut steamed with peach gum - a MUST-TRY

comfortable dining environment

attentive staff
